p: Tail Factor: This parameter was measured at values of 14.2 for intubated-ICU patients, 10.1 for non-intubated-ICU patients, 5.9 for non-ICU patients, and 3.3 for healthy subjects. Increased tail factor rates were observed in all groups compared to healthy individuals (p < 0.01), with the consistent order of damage being: intubated-ICU, non-intubated-ICU, and non-ICU (p < 0.01).
